page.title: 13Life on a Dairy Farm 1
page.content:
My Dad has got a farm in our study area. The farm is about 100 acres, and we have got a herd of pedigree {Friesian cows.
My Dad has to get up very early in the morning to milk the cows. We have a 'Herring-bone'{milking parlour}which takes eight cows at a time. The cows are milked by electris milking machine but it still takes over two hours to milk all sixty cows.
The milk is cooled and collected in a large{refridgerated tank.} I think we produce about a thousand litres. The milk is collected by the{milk lorry and taken to the{Unigate Dairy}in {Totnes,}which is about three miles away.
